description: mounted on ivory paper with brown border; sketchy; seated woman hugging distressed child at left; standing man at right; handwritten text, ULC
medium: Pen and brown ink over traces of black chalk on laid paper
provenance: Sale, Sotheby's, London, December 8, 1972, no. 71, for £850, to 'Delon; '[Alain Delon, Paris, 1972-80; to Bunzl]; [Yvonne Tan Bunzl, London, until 1980; sold July 9 for £1,400, to Moir]; Alfred Moir, Santa Barbara (1980-d. 2010; bequeathed to MIA)
title: Expulsion of Hagar
